Have you got the no-ip DUC downloaded?

I bet you hes advertising

jesus dude i was just saying no need to be a fucking prick u retarded bastard[/quote]Let’s use our nice language, now (both of you). No need to get your panties in a bunch.

If that doesn’t work (still change though), it’s located again, somewhere else.[/quote]Are you trying to saying that IP and IP address aren’t the same things?.. 'Kay.
